content.question: Email Summary Table
content.answer: *Email summary table* is a system generated table inserted at the beginning of each email to provide a quick overview of the email original content. It will be removed when the email is replied.

content.question: Sender Name, Sender Email and Subject
content.answer: *Sender name*, *sender email* and *subject* listed in the email summary table are the are the sender name, sender email and subject of the original email.

content.question: Email Entrance
content.answer: *Email entrance* is the original recipient of the email. When the email is replied, this address will be used as the sender address.

content.question: Trace Alert
content.answer: *Trace alert* is a notification that there is a traced link detected in the original email.

content.question: Unsecured Link Alert
content.answer: *Unsecured link alert* is a notification that there are unsecured links detected in the original email. In such case, all the unsecured links are listed in the following *Unsecured URLs* column.

content.question: Quick Email Actions
content.answer: *Quick email actions* are the actions that can be performed on the email directly from the email summary table.
